scripts.release: yarn build:production && mkdir -p release/formality/trunk && cp -R admin dist includes languages public readme.txt formality.php license.txt uninstall.php index.php release/formality/trunk && cp -R release/formality/trunk release/formality/tags
scripts.download: yarn build:production && mkdir -p download/formality && cp -R admin dist includes languages public readme.txt formality.php license.txt uninstall.php index.php download/formality && cd ./download && zip -r formality.zip formality -x '.DS_Store' -x '__MACOSX' && cd -
scripts.i18n:pot: yarn build && wp i18n make-pot . languages/formality.pot --exclude=assets,release,download --headers='{"Last-Translator":"Formality <hi@formality.dev>","Language-Team":"Formality <hi@formality.dev>>"}'
scripts.i18n:json: rm -rf ./languages/*.json || true && wp i18n make-json languages/ --no-purge --pretty-print
